text:
LinkedIn | Senior Front End/UI Engineer | Sunnyvale & San Francisco, CA | On-Site | Full-time

LinkedIn is looking for engineers who are eager to tackle the challenges of a rapidly growing web application with millions of daily visitors. We're looking for developers to help build rich, dynamic client-side web applications using Javascript, leveraging new technologies like HTML5/CSS3, to launch beautiful, usable and scalable products for our 400+ million global users.

If interested, please send resumes to Lnnguyen@linkedin.com
